name: European Noise Barrier Federation
goal:
The European Noise Barrier Federation ENBF is a non-profit association which coordinates the view of National Organisations and experts in the field of noise reducing devices along traffic lines. The ENBF is a unique platform at European level which promotes information exchange and research.
The European Noise Barrier Federation promotes specific objectives addressing traffic noise abatement in the spirit befitting a non-profit making organisation. These objectives are:

To support Research & Development on systems and products;
To provide effective support to legislation / administration;
To promote qualification standards;
To advice professionals and inform public.
interests: Competition, Environment, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: CPR, CE Marking, Public procurement, green public procurement, Environmental Noise Directive
